metadata.name: Soul Heart Generator Unnerf
metadata.description:
Unnerfs a bunch of items and other things that generate soul hearts that got nerfed in Repentance Currently Unnerfs: -The Relic -Dark Bum -Blue Fires in Hard Mode
You can enable/disable unnerfs by going into the mods main.lua file and changing any enable[unnerfHere] = true lines from true to false or vice versa
